sentences.sContent: And whenever I saw woolen products advertised, I stopped to see what was on offer.
sentences.sContent_eng: And whenever I saw woolen products advertised, I stopped to see what was on offer.
sentences.sCn: 无论我在哪儿看见关于羊毛制品的广告，我都会停下来看看。

sentences.sContent: I loved the smell of cork grease and slide oil, of musty woolen uniforms, and the tangy dankness of brassy horn bells.
sentences.sContent_eng: I loved the smell of cork grease and slide oil, of musty woolen uniforms, and the tangy dankness of brassy horn bells.
sentences.sCn: 我喜欢闻松脂和黑色润滑油味道，喜欢闻羊毛制服的霉味和潮湿的黄铜喇叭的扑鼻气味。

phrases.pCn: 纺毛织物；粗纺纤维；呢绒

words.tran: 羊毛的；模糊的；似羊毛的
羊毛；毛线；绒线；毛织品；毛料衣物
羊毛工（把羊毛分类的人）
